name: Geoff Griffiths
personality: Brave and resourceful, but also hot-headed and stubborn.
story: Geoff grew up in a tough, working-class neighborhood. His family was always struggling to make ends meet, and Geoff knew that if he wanted a better life, he would have to work for it. He joined the military as soon as he was old enough, and quickly rose through the ranks thanks to his determination and natural talent.
